description:
Born from the (possibly wise) decision of serving beer & food at the 2010 Palm WebOS Developer Days, here's a beer counting app that, well, actually provides somewhat meaningful information.  

(Use is for entertainment purposes only.  The estimated time may vary based upon your body weight, metabolism, ability to estimate the alcohol content or size of a mixed drink, or your inability to read a clock.  Not to be used as a substitute for your own judgement.  Do not drink & drive.  If in doubt, call a cab!)
